name: PlaySpace VR
description:
Are you a child at heart? PlaySpaceVR is a series of mini-games involving painting, archery, playing fetch and more! The perfect introductory experience to VR.

Key Features

  • Simple, intuitive controls
  • 4 different mini-games exploring the possibilities of VR
  • Lovely music
  • A friendly cubic companion!
  • Cheap price!

Important - . If you are unsure whether the game will run properly, try downloading the free demo first.

Hardware Requirements -

  • Requires a HTC Vive.
  • Recommended minimum PC spec as provided by HTC for the Vive - https://www.vive.com/uk/ready/

To see more of my work - https://jpholmes122.wixsite.com/website

For feature requests, bug reports or business inquiries, email me on - jpholmes122@gmail.com.

Trailer music provided by www.bensound.com (Royalty Free).
